articles.author: Rob Merrick
articles.title: EU Commissioner attacks breach of international law after Brexit port checks halted in Northern Ireland - The Independent
articles.description: UK government under fire after attempting to distance itself from the DUP’s decision
articles.content:
An EU Commissioner has condemned a halt to Brexit port checks in Northern Ireland as a breach of international law.

articles.title: Paul Givan: Northern Ireland first minister preparing to resign - Sky News
articles.content:
Northern Ireland First Minister Paul Givan is preparing to announce his resignation, a senior Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) source says.
